### Student t-test 

```{r}
# Extract the first three values from the column
subset_values <- RDeeP_HeLa_Mitosis[1, 1:3]

# Perform the t-test
t_test_result <- t.test(subset_values)

# Print the t-test result
print(t_test_result)
```
